title: reasons why afking shouldnt be against the rules
body:
1. toxic players don't deserve wins so if they are getting bad enough i'm just gonna afk, i shouldn't be punished because people are being mean.

2. sorry but if my mom calls me to eat dinner i have to go otherwise she takes away my computer, i shouldn't be banned because of something in real life happening.

3. it's just a game get over it, who cares if u lost...just move on, your life isn't over if you lose.

banning for afking is a really outdated rule that just needs to go.
